snippet: The latest threat to the struggling Postal Service is a new partnership that will give customers the ability to pay bills using their e-mail accounts or AOL.
abstract: Latest threat to struggling United States Postal Service is a partnership between Manilla, bill-paying service owned by Hearts, and AOL; Manilla's customers will be able to view and pay their bills using e-mail accounts or through AOL's Web site.
lead_paragraph: The latest threat to the struggling Postal Service is a new partnership that will give customers the ability to pay bills using their e-mail accounts or AOL.

headline.main: Web Services to Challenge Post Office in Bill-Paying
headline.print_headline: Web Services To Challenge Post Office In Bill-Paying
